name: OHTLE
description:
Late at night in your hotel room, you can hear the familiar sounds of the thing that is there for you every night. You're well equipped to deal with him, it all just depends on how fearful you are.

Support the game? Buy The Soundtrack!

Featuring

  • An (almost) entire hotel.
  • Something around.
  • You can hear him.
  • The employee only area.
  • Him.
  • Full original soundtrack.
  • Gameplay.
  • and much more!

What happened time ago that caused this? Am I going insane? Am I in the right? What happened on those top floors? Who caused it? Where is he?

Developed by @EvanRusnak
